hibernate-mapping.query: from org.mifos.application.customer.client.business.ClientAttendanceBO clientAttendance where clientAttendance.customer.customerId = :CUSTOMER_ID and clientAttendance.meetingDate = :MEETING_DATE

select new org.mifos.application.customer.client.business.service.ClientAttendanceDto(client.customerId, ca.meetingDate, ca.attendance) from org.mifos.application.customer.client.business.ClientAttendanceBO ca, org.mifos.application.customer.client.business.ClientBO client where ca.customer.customerId = client.customerId and client.office.officeId = :OFFICE_ID and ca.meetingDate = date(:MEETING_DATE)
